episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the improbability of a cough-free podcast recording, the banning of centurions at the Colosseum, the unusual method of dropping chicken heads to combat rabies in Switzerland, and a study on the dangers of punching glass.

facts.fact: There is only a one in 800,000 chance that nobody will cough during this podcast recording.
The Colosseum has recently banned centurions.
From 1978 to 1991, tens of thousands of chicken heads were dropped from helicopters over Switzerland.
In 2015, a 10-year study concluded that punching glass is very dangerous.
